m_szDocTitle: Electric vehicles now permitted to drive on HOV lanes in B.C.
m_szDocSumamry: Electric vehicles now permitted to drive on HOV lanes in B.C. 12:36 PM PST, Wed March 02, 2016 Comments Image: Electric Car Charging / Shutterstock Electric vehicle drivers in British Columbia will now be able to use any of the province’s high occupancy vehicle (HOV) lanes, without any passengers. The announcement was made at the GLOBE Conference today held at the Vancouver Convention Centre, which was also attended by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and most of Canada’s provincial premiers ahead of tomorrow’s First Ministers’ Conference.
